welcome_message_body: Welcome to Villa del Rosario, a charming Colombian city known for its rich history and beautiful colonial architecture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Antonio Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.description: The cargo terminal at San Antonio Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
